title: Re:Petit kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu
content:
Just like the previous “Break Time” shorts, this one lives off what the last one started, and goofs up just as bad as the latter did.

I did not enjoy this one as much as I did the first one, mainly because it felt dragged, many episodes felt rehashed, same dialogue, different characters.

The events discussed here are about the second half of the parent show, there are some major spoilers, but also some tiny, under-the-rug-swept extra expositions about stuff that happened in the show.

This could have been better had episodes been cut. Getting rid of filler.
Also, is it just me, or is the innocent Emilia pervycomment is getting stale?
